name: react-pullrefresh
description: react component pull to refresh navigation

scripts.ios:start: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && ./node_modules/react-native/packager/packager.sh --root test
scripts.android:start: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && ./node_modules/react-native/packager/packager.sh --root test
scripts.update:github: git checkout gh-pages && git merge develop && npm run build:test && git commit -am updates && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout develop

author: Yusuke Shibata <shibata@fata.io> (https://github.com/yusukeshibata)
